comments: JD is awesome! I had him for Genetics Discussion. He is a super funny guy. Classes were informative and entertaining. He does a good job of preparing you for the quizzes. The discussion manual is not that great (unless you love tables). Study what he says and Andres\' lecture notes. Quizzes were usually pretty easy. Mix of m.c., t/f and short answer
Great TA, as long as you did and understood the work you got credit.

This lab was much harder than I had anticipated. JD\'s quizzes are very tough, but he goes out of his way to make sure that you understand. He uses a lot of helpful analogies that help you retain the information. I don\'t think I would have passed the lecture portion of the class if I hadn\'t taken advantage of office hour. Challenging but fair. A+

Very nice teacher. Easy class. I definitely recommend anyone to take his lab classes. It\'s almost impossible to not get an A if you study at least a little bit before the class. Teaches very well and is very helpful and kind. Take his class if you have a hard Prof. for the Biol lecture.
Simply adorable TA. funny and very helpful. Fun class, impossible to fail unless you don\'t show up for the labs. I recommend him. GREAT TEACHER!
He makes class really fun. Loves to crack jokes and makes the concepts easy to understand. Definitely take him!

He\'s a great T.A. Always cracks jokes and made class easy and enjoyable. Compared with what other people have told me, he\'s one of the best T.A.\'s for Biol 189 lab. I would definitely take him again if I could!
This guy wasn\'t even my TA. I went to his section to make up a missed lab and the dude is great. He explained everything so well and was hella funny. I would totally recommend him.
Very approachable, makes class fun and easy to understand.

This guy is super cute and sooo funny. I had him for a morning lab on a Friday and he kept us laughing. He\'s also a great teacher and is easy to understand. I learned a lot. Also he\'s super understanding and goes out of his way to help! A+
